scope.step: Given the user is on the Wikionary home page

scenario.title: Looking up the definition of 'apple'
scenario.step: Given the user is on the Wikionary home page
When the user looks up the definition of the word 'apple'net.thucydides.core.webdriver.exceptions.ElementShouldBeEnabledException: Expected enabled element was not enabled
Then they should see the definition 'A common, round fruit produced by the tree Malus domestica, cultivated in temperate climates.'
